title: FS: A Few Semi-Tough T207s (SGC) - Final Price Drop!
author: Bosox Blair

posts.post_title: FS: A Few Semi-Tough T207s (SGC) - Final Price Drop!
posts.post_content:
[Price reduced again on remaining card!]

Hi Folks,

Looking to sell or trade a few semi-tough Recruit back T207 cards.

1.  Nunamaker (SGC 40) = [SOLD] $95 + $6 shipping.  (In 2012 this card with a Recruit back in a lower grade - SGC 30 - sold for $157.50)

2. Gowdy (SGC 50) = $110 + $6 shipping.  (Last sale in this grade in 2012 went for $131).

Now - only the Gowdy is left - feel free to make an offer!!! :eek:

3. Perdue (SGC 50) = [SOLD!] $60 + shipping.  (Last 2 sold at auction in this grade for just over $63 each).

Paypal accepted and preferred.  PM me - first to say "I'll take it" gets priority.  Then you have to pay...promptly :).

Thanks for looking!!!
beautiful cards Blair...too bad they're not highlanders!!!  Good luck...these should go quick!

[quote name="ullmandds" post=1295711]beautiful cards Blair...too bad they're not highlanders!!!  Good luck...these should go quick![/QUOTE]

Thanks Pete!!!

Motivated to move these remaining two cards by Thursday, July 17...make me a good offer and you never know! :)

(Will also consider trades for pre-war HOF cards, Red Sox, and certain HOF autographs.)

Thanks for looking!

Bump - prices reduced...and open to reasonable offers on sale or trade! :)

Cheers,
Blair

Last reduction - take both remaining T207 cards for $200 + shipping!!!

Cheers,
Blair

Late October bump...these poor old T207s need a warm new home before winter sets in...;).

Cheers,
Blair
